name: Parallax2D
tagline: A simple Parallax script for Unity (2D)
body:
### Welcome to Parallax2D!
_Parallax2D_ Is a free open source script, That allows open _Parallax_(s) in UNITY2D

### Crafting
Wrote entirely in C# (C_Sharp)to give the fastest processing and the smoothest effects in the Unity engine, No matter how many objects are _Parallax_(ed) within your scene.

### Want to change the script?
Go ahead, Have fun! This script is entirely open-source, and is licenced under the MIT Licence, YOuj can read it [here](http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT), or in the readme file included with the Script 

### Authors and Contributors
-joedanhol (joedanhol.net, Author)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with the script? Email me at contact@joedanhol.net, Or drop a error report [here](https://github.com/joedanhol/Parallax2D/issues)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
